meanings.definition: An abnormal enlargement of a part of the body, typically as a result of injury or inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The swelling on his ankle was painful and red.
meanings.sent2: After the bee sting, the swelling on her arm was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The swelling on the balloon made it look like a funny, lopsided shape.
meanings.sent4: The swelling of emotions in her heart was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The swelling on the tomato made it burst with ripeness.

meanings.definition: The action of becoming larger or more full.
meanings.sent1: The swelling of the river after the heavy rain caused flooding.
meanings.sent2: The swelling of the crowd at the concert made it hard to move.
meanings.sent3: The swelling of the balloon with air was a fun sight for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The swelling of pride in his chest was evident in his confident stance.
meanings.sent5: The swelling of the music in the room filled every corner with sound.
